forensic_evidence.description: Analysis of server logs for unauthorized access attempts.

findings.detected_anomaly: Multiple failed login attempts from a single IP.
findings.potential_impact: Brute force attack attempt on SSH service.
findings.recommended_action: Increase monitoring on the source IP and implement account lockout policy.

findings.detected_anomaly: Large amount of data sent to an unknown external address.
findings.potential_impact: Possible data exfiltration by an insider threat.
findings.recommended_action: Isolate affected systems and begin an in-depth investigation.

forensic_evidence.description: Unexpected changes in system files detected.

findings.detected_anomaly: System binary has been replaced with a modified version.
findings.recommended_action: Perform a full system scan and compare with known good hashes.

forensic_evidence.description: Suspicious image file received in email.

findings.detected_anomaly: Image contains hidden data as revealed by steganalysis tools.
findings.potential_impact: Covert communication channel for exfiltrating sensitive information.
findings.recommended_action: Trace the origin of the email and analyze the extracted data for further clues.
